description: Development of 55-91 Knightsbridge (including retention of Knightsbridge and William Place facades) to provide retail (Class A1) at basement and ground floor levels, office (Class B1) at part ground, first, and second floor levels and 21 residential flats at part ground, part first, part 2nd floors and 3rd to 5th floor levels. Off street servicing and new sub basement car park. Removal and replacement of existing tree on William Street. Demolition of 1-2 William Street and its replacement with a redesigned building with internal linkages to 55-91 Knightsbridge. Restoration and repair of external facades and roofs to 3-7 William Street includeing reinstatement of original roof profile at 4 William Street, conversion of 1st to 3rd floor levels of 3 and 4 William Street for residential purposes (Class C3) [Proposal 2].
